message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $130. I think it's a great deal considering its value to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $110.
Bob, I understand your offer but $110 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $125. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I would like to stick with my initial proposal of $110. Thank you for considering my perspective.
